700535f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Southern Boulevard
700535f-a.text:
1723 to 1753 (empty l1ot, foreground) Boston Road, west side, adjoining
and at (left to right) its intersection with Southern Boulevard, showing
excavation work in progress on the site on which were. later erected two
2-story and two 1-story brick buildings. In the background appear the
rears of buildings facing on Crotona Park East.
July 31, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

700534f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Southern Boulevard
700534f-a.text:
Boston Road, south from its intersection with Southern Boulevard,
showing the Hunt Residence. During the War for Independence.Washington
held an important conference with a spy here. The house was later
demolished and on its site was erected a 2-story brick building bearing
Nos. 1723-1737.
1899.
Gift of Randall Comfort.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
